title: Fix content accuracy issues from QA audit (TASK-031)
description: Fix 7 issues found by QA in TASK-031: (1) README references nonexistent 'config get' subcommand — remove or fix, (2) README says default length 25 but actual is 30 — fix to 30, (3) README config path says ~/.config/mixaroo-lite/ but actual is mixaroo-lite-nodejs/ — fix, (4) PUBLISHING.md file counts/sizes wrong due to old tarball leak — update to 30 files/17.3KB, (5) Blog says ~500 lines but source is ~1668 — fix, (6) Blog roadmap lists save/load as future but already shipped — move to shipped features, (7) CHANGELOG date 2026-02-20 needs confirmation — verify and fix if needed.
